title: Fix an issue with some GPU
message:
Fix an issue with some GPU

On some GPU (ex with LG Nexus 5) the glLinkprogram fails silently even though the shader was compiled correctly. It seems to involve arrays and the gl_Position built-in. I've removed the constraint.
